channel.title: [Tut] How too make sure your server has minimal downtime
channel.description:
[B]Step one:[/B] create a batch file (.bat) with this in it [code] tskill java /a [/code] name it killserver.bat
[b]Step two:[/b] 1. goto start > program files (all programs) > Accessories > system tools > scheduled tasks
[b]Step three [/b] 1. click add scheduled tasks 2. click next 3. click browse and find the killserver.bat you made 4. set perform task daily 5. set start time for 12:00 am 6. set preform task everyday 7. set start date for current date 8. skip the username part unless you share a computer and you do the logout login thing with family members 9. click open advanced settings when finished and click finished [b](if you didnt set the password stuff you will get a error dont worry about it)[/b] 10. check run only if logged in 11. goto the schedule tab and hit advanced 12. check repeat task 13. make it so it repeats the task every 1 hour for 23 hour duration
[b]Step 4[/b]
1. repeat step 3 only this time make the start time 12:01 am and the file will be your compile&run.bat or server.bat
[b]Step 5 [/b] 1. right click killserver.bat and click run in the scheduled tasks folder then repeat for the other one you made
now every 1 hour your server will terminate and will restart 1 minute after termination this way if your server crashes the most it will be crashed for is 59 minutes instead of all day when your at school work ect.

item.title: [Tut] How too make sure your server has minimal downtime
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

This didn’t work for me when I used the tut on runestatus… I did however find a much better way which I will post here once I’m out of school… if I go straight home… I found a macro which records what you click and you can set timer intervals between things its sorta like scar but easier… and without color picking and has a list of commands and how they work which come wiht it in a drop down menu… its really cool I just set it so that it closes and sets up my server every hour plus i have auto save every half hour on my server so thats how that works… along with that, I also use this macro to shut off my autoed character in aryan at a random time so it doesn’t get to suspicious and so far its been working with rs-resources aryan updated by Taios which is great, I’m lvl 59 mining in 2 days close too 60 and will probably be about 65+ tonight… when I get home…

Read full topic

item.title: [Tut] How too make sure your server has minimal downtime
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:1, topic:711”]Step one: create a batch file (.bat)
with this in it

tskill java /a

name it killserver.bat

Step two:

  1. goto start > program files (all programs) > Accessories > system tools > scheduled tasks

Step three

  1. click add scheduled tasks
  2. click next
  3. click browse and find the killserver.bat you made
  4. set perform task daily
  5. set start time for 12:00 am
  6. set preform task everyday
  7. set start date for current date
  8. skip the username part unless you share a computer and you do the logout login thing with family members
  9. click open advanced settings when finished and click finished
    (if you didnt set the password stuff you will get a error dont worry about it)
  10. check run only if logged in
  11. goto the schedule tab and hit advanced
  12. check repeat task
  13. make it so it repeats the task every 1 hour for 23 hour duration

Step 4

  1. repeat step 3 only this time make the start time 12:01 am and the file will be your compile&run.bat or server.bat

Step 5

  1. right click killserver.bat and click run in the scheduled tasks folder then repeat for the other one you made

now every 1 hour your server will terminate and will restart 1 minute after termination this way if your server crashes the most it will be crashed for is 59 minutes instead of all day when your at school work ect.[/quote]

Hey thanks for posting the tut that I put on RuneStatus minus the screenshots and not posting any credit!

Read full topic
item.source: [Tut] How too make sure your server has minimal downtime

  11. goto the schedule tab and hit advanced
  12. check repeat task
  13. make it so it repeats the task every 1 hour for 23 hour duration

Step 5

  1. right click killserver.bat and click run in the scheduled tasks folder then repeat for the other one you made

now every 1 hour your server will terminate and will restart 1 minute after termination this way if your server crashes the most it will be crashed for is 59 minutes instead of all day when your at school work ect.
